translations: n．吸引力，魅力：具有吸引人的特质或特点。
· The allures of the city are hard to resist.
城市的吸引力很难抵挡。

sentences.sentence: Not evil, but goodness more often allures the feeling mind unused to reason.
sentences.translation: 往往不是恶，而是善，迷惑那些缺少理智、。

sentences.sentence: Cyber-communication is dummy, real-time and open etc. It strongly allures university students to use it.
sentences.translation: 网络传播具有虚拟性、即时性和开放性等特征，对大学生有着莫大的吸引力。

sentences.sentence: One of the allures of parenting services is they help avert some of the exasperating confrontations of childrearing.
sentences.translation: 这门生意之所以大受欢迎，是因为它能转移一些父母同孩子之间的激烈冲突。
